website_summaries.verdict: This alarm does not require you going in to turn off the alarm if the patient returns to the pad.
pros: A little larger than some of the other bed pads at 12" x 30"
You do not have to reset manually if weight is placed back on the bed or chair
cons: The alarm is very loud and does not have a volume

customer_reviews.title: Has a really loud annoying beep - but I think that is what you ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Has a really loud annoying beep - but I think that is what you want! Bought this for my mom who is at risk for falls so that we can hear if she tries to get up. Easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: TW141

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It works great now we’re abke to sleep without worrying if our mother is getting up and us not knowing it. We are actually resting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This has been invaluable to myself and my Dad's caregiver. Dad is unstable and is a serious fall candidate. He won't use a walker. When he wakes up he stands up and goes. The alarm alerts us that he is on the move and we can run (literally) to where he is (chair or bed) and get there before he falls. I would recommend this to anyone who has a loved one who is prone to falls and slightly disoriented (as my Dad) or full-blown dementia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A huge help
customer_reviews.text: We got this monitor when my mother started getting up out of bed without assistance, risking a serious fall. The monitor works well. Since my father (with hearing loss) doesn't always hear the alarm when 30 feet away in another room, we added a simple baby monitor to transmit the alarm into the other side of their home, but the alarm should be loud enough for those with normal hearing. It's simple to use and works well.
customer_reviews.author: watchbird

customer_reviews.title: No on/off
customer_reviews.text: No on/off button or volume control, so annoying sound even when bed exit is supervised. Had to buy another bed alarm with on/off and wireless, remote alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, works perfect
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up. Worked very well to keep mom off a broken leg. I could hear alarm from all rooms one level.
customer_reviews.author: LJN

customer_reviews.title: So loud you cant miss it !
customer_reviews.text: great idea, but not exactly what i needed. my dad has parkinson's and some side effects are difficulty getting out of bed, so i needed an alarm to know when he was trying to move from his bed. but if hes moving around then it sets off the alarm and its soo dog gone loud ! scares the whole house. i wanted a soft alert system maybe a light or soft alarm to let me know when he is moving something i can keep by my side so i can run to help out.
customer_reviews.author: sahar

customer_reviews.title: Not that reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my mother who has dementia and wonders around the house at night. The pad is a bit too small and not wide enough. The alarm is not loud enough and there is no control button to adjust the sound of the alarm. Started having trouble with the alarm. The alarm would not reset. I had to take the battery out in order for the alarm to go off.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My Mother is very pleased with this product. She is my Dad's primary caregiver, and this has given her more quality sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Reenie C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine, never got to use it, Mom passed away before we could get her home.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cuddy

customer_reviews.title: Not loud at all
customer_reviews.text: For a bed alarm the alarm is not loud at all. You can’t hear it if you are in the other room. We had to get a baby monitor and place next to the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Misty W

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: This item will no longer work. We have replaced the 9 volt battery. I have only been using this item 2.5 months. I need to order something that wil work. I’d like to ask if I can return this bed alarm for credit on my amazon account. Thank you Marilyn Crouch
customer_reviews.author: Russ Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Early rating
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only been in use 3 nights.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Daman

customer_reviews.title: So much less expensive and convenient opposed to the brand name I previously purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This bed alarm was so easy to install and loud enough to hear no matter where I was in the home. It has an auto reset when pressure is applied so I knew if it was just a reposition or actually getting up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Now I don't have to worry when she gets up.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked everything about it and easy to use. I'm using your product because of my girlfriend she uses a Walker and always loses her balance when getting out of bed now I can hear when she gets up so I can help with her walking.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip A. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Does not reset after two weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of use the security alarm would not reset at all took the battery out put it back in and still wouldn’t reset not worth the money I have to find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Natale

customer_reviews.title: Not a good alarm
customer_reviews.text: Not any good.bought it in july and in september it started beeping for no reason.after opening it up it looked like the battery burned one of the post and it melted on the post
customer_reviews.author: p

customer_reviews.title: It's simple
customer_reviews.text: Unsure of the product not what I thought I was ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lemaster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alarm when in close proximity
customer_reviews.text: The volume was not as loud as we hoped. When caregiver at other end of home, he was unable to hear patient alarm adequately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alarm is very hard to turn off.
customer_reviews.text: Alarm is very hard to turn off. It wasn’t just me my son found it very hard to turn off the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Kalin

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed. It does cause you to get warm since it is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Klemm

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Had issue silencing the alarm after patient got off pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed results
customer_reviews.text: Well I am not sure how to write this review! Everything seems to work fine and it worked great in the recliner chair we put in that my Dad sits in.....however when I tried it in his bed at night time we just could not get it to work right! The alarm seem to go off every time he moved! Tried 3 different nights with 3 different positions with all same results! So like I said if your wanting for chair use I would give 5 stars, but for a bed I can only give 3 and I am giving that much because it still could work for someone else’s bed just not my Dads!
customer_reviews.author: Diana L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Has helped my mother to be safe and me to sleep more restfully. Only one comment: thought from other reviewers that the alarm was separate from the pad as I did not want the alarm to scare her or to be shut off by her. As it turns out, the alarm is attached with a cord to the pad. Found out it doesn't matter as the alarm is loud enough if I am indoors (1300 sq. house) and she cannot shut it off herself. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Life safer
customer_reviews.text: This has worked wonderfully so far, burnt through the battery that came with it pretty quick. That's not enough to drop a star though, easy fix. Edit: We have been using this nightly for 2 years now and it finally had its first issue. It went off randomly, I have no idea why, I changed the battery earlier in the night. I unplugged the battery and plugged back in and its back to normal. With that said I am going to order one for backup, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah McQuiston

customer_reviews.title: Lets you sleep but has a loud beep.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up. I w as disappointed that the alarm was not separate so it coyld be brought to another room. The alarm is strong enough to be heard across our house though and since my dad sleeps without his hearing aids it is ok. Probably wouldn't recommend it for elderly person who has good hearing.
customer_reviews.author: AaronJ Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 89 year old Dad
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help my dad’s caregivers be alert to when he gets up at night. He is prone to falling and refuses to ask for help. This alarm gives them notice when he tries to get up in his own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for safety
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my MIL.. who has dementia and is a fall risk. Had it a year now... and just now had to change the batteries. Very loud, super sensitive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have it positioned under the shoulder area are it will go off every time they move.
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I needed it for. I needed to know when my ill mom was trying to get out up out of bed at night. It's great for that and loud enough to hear.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Easterling

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to turn off the alarm
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for our needs. Not easy to turn off the alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for our elderly mom, who's begun to wander and needs some assistance while walking.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T

customer_reviews.title: Works, but faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Works great alarming us to let us know my grandfather is trying to get out of bed. I can’t give it more than 3 stars though because... this stupid thing will NOT turn off. It worked 1 time holding the reset button to turn it off. One. Time. I have to unplug the battery everytime he’s supposed to get out of the bed. So we’re screwed if I forget to put the battery back in at night. Although it does work, I would never recommend this faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

product_meta.title: Secure 45BSET-1Y Bed Exit Alarm Set for Fall and Wandering Prevention - Includes Patient Monitor with Holder, 12" x 30" Antimicrobial Sensor Pad and Batteries
product_meta.description: The Secure 45BSET-1Y Bed Exit Alarm Set (US Patent No. 6,847,301) effectively alerts caregivers when a fall risk patient attempts to exit the bed. Alarm monitor automatically resets when patient returns to sensor pad, or it can be reset using the three-push reset button. Secure Universal Alarm Special Features: 1 Tone, 80 dB, Tamper-Resistant, Break-Resistant ABS Plastic, Auto-Reset Feature, Always-On Feature, Alert Light, 2 AAA Batteries Included, Low Battery Indicator, Battery Tester, Three Push Reset, One Year Warranty
feature_bullets: The Secure 45BSET-1Y Bed Exit Alarm Set (US Patent No. 6,847,301) effectively alerts caregivers when a fall risk patient attempts to exit the bed - Alarm monitor automatically resets when patient returns to sensor pad, or it can be reset using the three-second hold reset feature
80 dB tamper-resistant SUA-1 alarm monitor and Velcro holder w/1 Year Warranty - Antimicrobial, incontinent Proof, latex-free bed sensor pad w/45 day warranty
12"x30" bed sensor pad is antimicrobial, Latex-free, and can be folded for storage - Comfortable ultra thin design - No weight restrictions
Sensor pad features metal connecting pin that will not break (compare to competitive alarms that use weak plastic connectors) - Can be used on all mattresses

Set includes SUA-1Y Alarm Monitor, 12"x30" Bed Sensor Pad, Alarm Holder w/Velcro Strap, & 2x AAA Batteries - Trust in the brand used in over 7000 concerned care facilities throughout the US, Canada, and Europe

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
